content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ms. Wang. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits both our needs. How much are you considering to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm looking to pay around 650 Euros per month, including all utilities. Is this within your budget range?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 650 Euros per month is below my asking price. The apartment is in high demand due to its central location, and I'm looking for a rent that reflects its value. Are you willing to negotiate?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I am willing to negotiate. Could you please tell me your highest price so we can discuss?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: My highest price would be 800 Euros per month, including all utilities. This is a fair price considering the quality and location of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the offer, but 800 Euros is still higher than my budget. Can we discuss a price closer to my initial offer of 650 Euros? I'm flexible and willing to consider additional terms if needed.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 650 Euros is simply too low for this apartment. The market value, as well as the location and amenities, justify a higher price. However, I'm willing to consider additional terms to make the apartment more affordable for you. What other terms would you be interested in discussing?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm open to discussing any terms that would make the apartment more affordable. Would it be possible to have a longer lease term, for example? Or perhaps there are additional services you could provide that would be beneficial to me? I'm also willing to pay a higher price if the apartment comes partially furnished or if there are any special discounts available.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, and I'm willing to negotiate. However, the apartment is unfurnished, and I do not offer any additional services. A longer lease term might be an option, but only if the monthly rent is adjusted accordingly. I'm open to finding a solution that works for both of us. What is the highest monthly rent you would be willing to pay, considering a longer lease term?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: If we're discussing a longer lease term, I would be willing to pay up to 700 Euros per month, including all utilities, for a period of two years. This would be a fair compromise, I believe, considering the market value and the amenities provided. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 700 Euros per month for a two-year lease term is an interesting offer. It's still below my asking price, but the security of a long-term lease is an attractive proposition. I'm willing to accept your offer under these conditions. 'I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month!' The lease term will be two years, and the rent includes all utilities. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
